manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SMOOTH OPERATOR Eliminate the frizz effect with this conditioning formula that delivers amazing smoothness, making curly or frizzy hair more manageable to control. NOURISH + SOFTEN This anti-frizz conditioner features nourishing vitamins and nutrients that help restore moisture and bring softness back to frizzy hair. MINUTA OLIVE EXRACT Formulated with Minuta Olive Extract from the farm of Mr. Carmelo Messina in Ficarra, Messina, Italy. SHINE BRIGHT Every Essential Haircare product is specially formulated to deliver long-lasting fragrance, incredible shine and the ultimate silky-smooth finish.

LOVE Smoothing Instant Mask LOVE Smoothing Shampoo LOVE Hair Smoother Anti-Frizz Fast Reduce unwanted volume and tame hair Gently Cleanse Unruly Hair Cream foam smooths frizzy hair leaving a sleek finish Weightless Leave-On Cream Soften hair without weighing down style Comb and Straighten with Ease Sleek and shiny results for maximum satisfaction Shine and Elasticity Natural ingredients add maximum finish Smooth and Manageable Invisibly aids combability Zero Impact Ethos Obtained with 100% clean energy in recyclable packaging Protecting Biodiversity Contains active ingredient, Minuta Olive - part of the Slow Food Presidia Beauty for You and the Planet 100% of the energy we use to manufacture our products in Italy is renewable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful product, but smell fades over time
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this conditioner for ~3 months now, and it is truly the best conditioner I’ve ever used for my hair. I have thick, wavy, normally frizzy hair that tends to get dried out with other shampoos. This conditioner keeps the frizz under control and makes my hair feel amazingly soft and smooth. It does make it feel a bit weighed down, which is great for me, but may not be good for someone with finer or thinner hair. When I first got it, the scent was so lovely. However, after a few months the scent has faded considerably and has kind of an unpleasant undertone to it when I blow dry my hair. That’s my one complaint, but it’s so good in every other way that I’ll continue using it and buy more when I run out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best hairmask in the game!!!
reviews.reviewText: My hair is long, thick and coarse, this is my second purchase and:1. A little goes a long way, I have been using it for a year and I haven’t finish my second bottle. It really last a long time, it’s a great investment2. Half of my hair literally falls after a Brazilian blowout process, my hair was dull and very sensitized and this saved my hair, now it’s soft, shiny and thick, all thanks to this product.3. The smell it’s ok, I have a very sensitive nose and although I’m not fan of it, it doesn’t bother me at all4. I have tried everything Orbe, Kerastase, Briogeo, OUAI… nothing comes close to this product, it’s amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recommend the conditioner more than I would the shampoo. This is one of the only products I’ve found that both conditions my hair and improves its quality over time. It doesn’t weigh my hair down while still leaving it soft, manageable, and flowing instead of frizzed out. I use it regularly, without shampooing, and at times treat it like a mask.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most luxurious conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing. A little product goes a long way! Makes my hair feel super healthy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Spoke too soon!
reviews.reviewText: “I was really excited to try this brand but I have to say I was underwhelmed. Not a huge fan of the scent, products come half full and for the price I can’t justify purchasing the full sizes that might come halfway filled. My hair felt dry after using and this did not help my frizz. I had been using the pureology smoothing shampoo and conditioner and noticed a huge difference in my hair so I’ll probably stick to this. Again, I really wanted to love these products and the brand but so far I’m just not impressed. Maybe it takes a few washes, so I will finish the products off and update the review if I see a noticeable difference.”Update: I used the product again today and I have to stand 100% corrected. I have absolutely no frizz at all and the scent smells much lighter and better actually on the hair than in the tub. My main complaint with this product is how they’re not filling the tub up completely. For such a tiny jar at $16.00/jar I expect it to be full. This also doesn’t seem like a fluke as almost all reviews and images of the product show that it is half full. I think I will purchase the full size and refill the smaller one for travel instead of purchasing separate travel size ones because my mind has been changed on this product and I love that the conditioner is more solid in consistency which is perfect for travel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Davines products always please me, and this was no exception! Yes, this size is small, and it looks as if it's enough for three uses but a small amount goes a long way as with all their products.I agree, the container could be smaller and more full looking so that the customer doesn't feel slighted, but you are definitely getting the correct amount.If you like davines products and plan on using one product specifically I'd suggest to get the larger size. If you like using different formulas get a few of these sizes. The ingredients aren't like your average drug store shampoo where you need to use more. Worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was first introduced to this brand by my hair stylist. It is great for controlling frizz. My hair feels silky and soft. I use the matching conditioner too. They are both worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does what they advertise
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product now for 9 years, discovered it while visiting Italy, then my hair dresser started to carry it. your hair ends up like silk and it just does a great job. Great for the environment.

Me ha encantado. Creo que sólo voy a usar éste producto el resto de mi vida. Suaviza mucho, huele genial y deja un pelo super suave y nada encrespado. Su única pega, el precio 😬. Un poquito caro pero es que vale la pena.

Questo prodotto mi è stato consigliato dal mio parrucchiere in quanto ho capelli mossi tendenti al crespo. Dopo lo sciampoo applico un po di prodotto su tutta la capigliatura e lo lascio in posa almeno 5 minuti se non di più, dopo sciaquo e i capelli sono morbidi e facili da districare. Ottimo sia se il asciugo lisci o mossi ( con spazzola) .Lo consiglio
tres bien cheveux brillant et soyeux
este producto es muy bueno. es un precio alto pero vale la pena porque dura mucho
